summary: Simply adds a fast-travel map marker for the player house in the Dragonborn DLC for convenience.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://i.cubeupload.com/87gtrB.gif[/img][img]http://u.cubeupload.com/deanoman/logonexus.png[/img]
[img]https://s12.postimg.org/8ob8pnxml/frozen.png[/img]

Simply adds a fast-travel map marker for the player house in the Dragonborn DLC for convenience.

REQUIRES the [url=http://store.steampowered.com/app/226880/]Official Dragonborn DLC[/url] to be installed and enabled.

I created this simple mod since I could not find anything similar on the Nexus yet.

[color=orange]This is the final version of this mod. I am no longer playing Skyrim and will not be continuing to update my files on the Skyrim Nexus anymore. All the best! :D[/color]

[url=http://www.skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/1015221]Please check out all my mods![/url]
author: Deanoman
